body_type_recommendations.hourglass: Emphasize your waist with fitted clothing and belts.
body_type_recommendations.pear: Balance your silhouette with tops that add volume to your upper body.
body_type_recommendations.apple: Choose flowing fabrics and V-necks to create a lengthening effect.
body_type_recommendations.rectangle: Create curves with peplum tops, wrap dresses, and cinched waists.
body_type_recommendations.inverted triangle: Balance your shoulders with A-line skirts or wide-leg pants.

style_personalities.classic: You prefer timeless, polished looks that never go out of style.
style_personalities.bohemian: Your style is free-spirited, with a mix of patterns, textures, and earthy tones.
style_personalities.minimalist: You gravitate towards clean lines, neutral colors, and simple silhouettes.
style_personalities.preppy: Your look is polished and put-together, often featuring traditional patterns and colors.
style_personalities.edgy: You like to push boundaries with bold, daring choices and a hint of rebellion.
style_personalities.romantic: Your style is soft, feminine, and often features floral prints and delicate details.
